attributes.action: formally request Margaret Hodge retract her statement on immigrant housing or ask her to resign from the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Margaret Hodge has brought has brought shame on her government and her party by demanding that immigrants should be deprioritised for social housing. We the undersigned agree that housing should be provided on the basis of need and not nationality. Hodge runs the risk of legitimising the BNP message in her constituency and so must retract her statement or resign to ensure collective responsibility in the government.
